channel.title: daysold on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in daysold on Barefoot Rob

item.title: 17000 days old today!
item.description: 09:09 October 9th, 2016 JST Today is my 17000th day! SOGOhas been moved to 2pm because it’s raining hard enough to be considered rain in my book! Tonight after the workout I’m going to join Lin at her sisters for food and karaoke, which luckily landed on my 17000th day! 17:52 Monday 10 October 2016 JST Karaoke was great! It was Lin, Charu, and Mikako; we all had fun singing though by the end I was sooo tired I just lay down and listened.

item.title: I am 16989 days old today
item.description:
23:41 Wednesday 28 September 2016 JST And I hope to add a counter to my static site tonight. 00:09 yay!
Based on code from my thing on codepen See the Pen Rob’s days old counter by Rob Nugen (@thunderrabit) on CodePen.

item.title: 16942 days old today!
item.description: 21:16 Friday 12 August 2016 JST I am 16942 days old today! I will by 17000 days old on October 9th, 2016!
